Name: Content Creator's Internet Adventure
About the game: (Note that gamejolt isn't required to play, it's only required if you intend to collect achievements) Keep in mind that this game has a much higher difficulty than it first lets on. RedVacktor, StephofAnime and JacenSketch decide they want to go on an adventure Join them as they travel around the W.E.B Territory and learn about the hidden mysteries. CCIA includes 16 playable Content Creators, 5-6 main story bosses, 3-4 mini bosses, over 9 different base enemies, as well as References, Memes and LOTS AND LOTS of Dialog. currently the 16 content creators are DangerDoug, Ozzy, StephOfAnime, RedVacktor, JacenSketch, Aliensrock, Dawko, Mairusu, LOTS_OF_PYRO, CuriousCleffa, L8Sleeper, stereotype98, Codykoko, JeromeASF, Tewtiy and Daithi De Nogla. you will be able to unlock Gamejolt Achievements.
